verses.text: Arise , shine ; for thy light is come , and the glory of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* is risen upon thee.\f + \fr 60.1 \ft shine…: or, be enlightened; for thy light cometh\f*
For, behold, the darkness shall cover the earth , and gross darkness the people : but the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* shall arise upon thee, and his glory shall be seen upon thee.
And the Gentiles shall come to thy light , and kings to the brightness of thy rising.
Lift up thine eyes round about , and see : all they gather themselves together , they come to thee: thy sons shall come from far , and thy daughters shall be nursed at \add thy\add* side.

Then thou shalt see , and flow together , and thine heart shall fear , and be enlarged ; because the abundance of the sea shall be converted unto thee, the forces of the Gentiles shall come unto thee.\f + \fr 60.5 \ft abundance…: or, noise of the sea shall be turned toward thee\f*\f + \fr 60.5 \ft forces: or, wealth\f*

The multitude of camels shall cover thee, the dromedaries of Midian and Ephah ; all they from Sheba shall come : they shall bring gold and incense ; and they shall shew forth the praises of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

All the flocks of Kedar shall be gathered together unto thee, the rams of Nebaioth shall minister unto thee: they shall come up with acceptance on mine altar , and I will glorify the house of my glory.
Who \add are\add* these \add that\add* fly as a cloud , and as the doves to their windows ? \p

Surely the isles shall wait for me, and the ships of Tarshish first , to bring thy sons from far , their silver and their gold with them, unto the name of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy God , and to the Holy One of Israel , because he hath glorified thee.
And the sons of strangers shall build up thy walls , and their kings shall minister unto thee: for in my wrath I smote thee, but in my favour have I had mercy on thee.

Therefore thy gates shall be open continually ; they shall not be shut day nor night ; that \add men\add* may bring unto thee the forces of the Gentiles , and \add that\add* their kings \add may be\add* brought.\f + \fr 60.11 \ft forces: or, wealth\f*
For the nation and kingdom that will not serve thee shall perish ; yea, \add those\add* nations shall be utterly wasted.
The glory of Lebanon shall come unto thee, the fir tree , the pine tree , and the box together , to beautify the place of my sanctuary ; and I will make the place of my feet glorious.

The sons also of them that afflicted thee shall come bending unto thee; and all they that despised thee shall bow themselves down at the soles of thy feet ; and they shall call thee, The city of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, The Zion of the Holy One of Israel. \p
Whereas thou hast been forsaken and hated , so that no man went through \add thee\add*, I will make thee an eternal excellency , a joy of many generations.

Thou shalt also suck the milk of the Gentiles , and shalt suck the breast of kings : and thou shalt know that I the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \add am\add* thy Saviour and thy Redeemer , the mighty One of Jacob.
For brass I will bring gold , and for iron I will bring silver , and for wood brass , and for stones iron : I will also make thy officers peace , and thine exactors righteousness.
Violence shall no more be heard in thy land , wasting nor destruction within thy borders ; but thou shalt call thy walls Salvation , and thy gates Praise.

The sun shall be no more thy light by day ; neither for brightness shall the moon give light unto thee: but the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* shall be unto thee an everlasting light , and thy God thy glory.
Thy sun shall no more go down ; neither shall thy moon withdraw itself: for the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* shall be thine everlasting light , and the days of thy mourning shall be ended.
Thy people also \add shall be\add* all righteous : they shall inherit the land for ever , the branch of my planting , the work of my hands , that I may be glorified.
A little one shall become a thousand , and a small one a strong nation : I the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* will hasten it in his time.
